HOME.TITLE: Aurora
HOME.SUBTITLE: Perfect Care for Your Hair
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Discover our unique collection of hair care products

HERO.TITLE: Discover Your Natural Hair Beauty
HERO.SUBTITLE: Experience the power of nature with Aurora's sulfate-free shampoo, enhanced with rice protein and aloe vera extract.

SULFATE_FREE.TITLE: Sulfate Free
SULFATE_FREE.DESCRIPTION: Our gentle sulfate-free formula cleanses your hair without stripping its natural oils, keeping it soft, healthy, and naturally beautiful.

RICE_PROTEIN.TITLE: Rice Protein Power
RICE_PROTEIN.DESCRIPTION: Enhanced with rice protein that strengthens hair from root to tip, reduces breakage, and adds natural shine to your locks.

ALOE_VERA.TITLE: Aloe Vera Extract
ALOE_VERA.DESCRIPTION: Natural aloe vera extract provides deep hydration and nourishment, helping to repair damaged hair and protect it from environmental stress.

NATURAL.TITLE: Natural Ingredients
NATURAL.DESCRIPTION: Made with carefully selected natural ingredients working in harmony

ALL_HAIR_TYPES.TITLE: Suitable for All Hair Types
ALL_HAIR_TYPES.DESCRIPTION: Special formula designed to be gentle and effective for all hair types, from straight to curly, fine to thick.

ENVIRONMENTALLY_FRIENDLY.TITLE: Eco-Friendly
ENVIRONMENTALLY_FRIENDLY.DESCRIPTION: Committed to sustainability with eco-friendly packaging and responsible manufacturing practices.

ITEM2.TITLE: Natural Ingredients
ITEM2.DESCRIPTION: Rice Protein and Aloe Vera Extract

TESTIMONIAL1.QUOTE: My hair has never been better! Aurora's natural formula transformed my dry, damaged hair into soft, manageable locks.
TESTIMONIAL1.AUTHOR: - Sarah M.

TESTIMONIAL2.QUOTE: I love that it's sulfate-free and made with natural ingredients. My scalp is healthier and my hair is shinier!
TESTIMONIAL2.AUTHOR: - Mona R.

TESTIMONIAL3.QUOTE: Finally found a natural shampoo that actually works! The rice protein has made my hair stronger and more resilient.
TESTIMONIAL3.AUTHOR: - Layla A.

BRAND.TITLE: Aurora
